Hi Hi!

I have some bad news and some good news. 

But I'll start off with the bad news and get this over with.

The bad news is that the site has been taken down for time being till me and the seamstress finally settled on a price for every dress, apparently we have a translation problem. However this isn't entirely bad news, at all this means the dresses do not cost as much as they should. I am open for the secound batch of group orders once the new prices have been set up ^-^ please check with us often^_^!

Good news!
I am sure that everyone who has participated in the first group order has recieved my email ^_^. If there is anything you do not understand please feel free to ask me anything!Your order has been sent and is being made as we speak ^o^ They should arrive about middle or end of July and then I will seperate all the dresses and send to you once you have paid the secound payment. I hope upon recieving your items that you would perhaps concider writing us a review ^_^ and take many pictures of our items!

Secound payment
(group order shipping divide by # buyers) + (your choice of shipping to you)
http://csa-company.livejournal.com/4042.html

Orders are going so well I can't wait to hear the reviews coming in, I really hope eveyrone is pleased with the quality and workmenship^-^! the shpping is being delayed we hope that a few more people can jump on board the boat  so that X shipping would be cheaper ^^!!!!

(X shipping = the X ammount divided amoung the buyers for the seamstress to ship to me and Tracy in bulk then seperate to send to you^^)

Hi^-^

So i've heard from the Seamstress so updates!

She will be coming out with a few more replicas such as items from "Princess Doll", sometime in July 

Sample sale
-sample sale means that these items were used in the model pictures and have only been worn once. Of course this means there is discount^_^!!!!!!!!! For sample dresses you will not need to pay for variable X

Victorian Maiden OP - CHEOPE1 - $175
Victorian Maiden top bustle skirt (2 samples instock) - CHESKT1 - $100
Victorian Maiden Underskirt (2samples instock) - CHESKT2 - $45
Victorian Maiden Top - CHEBLO1 - $70

Note: the bustle skirt does not come with the white 3layered underskirt


I have some bad news about the Victorian Maiden OP. That there will be only two dresses made because all the fabric has been sold out. There is enough to make one more dress custom to whom ever buys it.
So there the sample dress and the one yet to be made^-^! 

Of course this dress can still be made in solid colors(no extra charge) or custom fabric (additional charge)

What a surprise today!

The sample dresses came in AND!!! oh my gosh what a surprise! apparently the 

Victoriam Maiden bustle set the fabric isn't that questionable it just looks funky in the picture XD!

Angelic Pretty flower print doesn't look as bad as the picture

Angelic pretty layered skirt THIS is the most surprising.. I had thought that the fabric was not suitable AT ALL! but was I EVER EVER EVER EVER so surprised  XD It is SO CUTE worn XD!!!! IT looks like like a ball gown cross lolita dress which is interesting mix after stufing perhaps 4 different types of petti in there (seamstress used tooo much fabric XD)

And another suprirsing fact that you cannot quite see in the picture of the Mary Magdalene replica is that it has scallop edges with ruffle edges  x.x.... I DID not see it in the picpic at ALL

The important lesson of wearing a correct PETTI COAT!

As for prices they are not settled yet apparently creator of Cherie collection had added ontop for the price to be able to be bargain-able. As for becoming a brand I hope that we can come to a agreement on price that is afforadable with promising workmenship and quality. So once the new prices are set they are not bargain-able.
http://csa-company.livejournal.com/2927.html

All the replicas, modified replicas and others garments are custom size, up to size medium with out price change. Any size larger must expect $10-20 extra charge for fabric and lace.

Size Medium
Bust 90CM
Waist 80CM
Hip 86CM

Getting your size
-largest measurement of your bust
-smallest measurement of your waist
-largest measurement of your hips
-measurement of around your arm (if the item you have has a sleeve)
Do not add ease to your measurments, the seamstress will add it for you. If you do then the dress will be too big for you.


Fabric
There is a choice of fabric colours, however we will be unable to provie a choice of fabric patterns unless we have a sample of the dress made in that fabric. Some of the fabric used, such as the Mary Magdalene replica are limited. Thus once the fabric store has sold out we will find the closest fabric to it as possible. All changes in fabric will be posted. Ordering the sample dress fabric is a first come first serve basis.

Custom Fabric
All garments can be made in solid colors with out additional charge. As for fabric with pattern, one  can request very general fabric (ie. organza fabric with big blue roses). Do keep in mind requestion "specific" fabric there is no previews and the price is subjected to change.

What is the total price?
price of item + X + shipping to you = total 
variable X is the shipping from the seamstress to us. This variable varies if there is more orders. With that stated everything thing must be in a group order to reduce X variable.

seamstress will only make in large quantity and send to us in large quantity. Then we can seperate the dresses to send it to people individually.

However the seamstress can send it directly to you which would cost $40+

So if your with the group order the shipping is divided among the people with in the group order. and then add the shipping from canada to you.

-add 4% of the total fee if paying by paypal

How to order
Please email to crazisilverangel@gmail.com

Subject - "ordering"
Dress Code: ___name of dress____
Color: sample dress fabric or other?
Bust
Waist
Hips
Arm
Waist To Knee
Address:

Payment
We will need two payments from you at two different times
- cost of dress
Once your dress has arrived we will need the secound payment
- variable X and shipping cost from us to you

Refund of half the first payment is available if you no longer desire the dress after first payment because the dress has already been made
http://csa-company.livejournal.com/2715.html

Hi Hi everyone ^-^ I am the head designer of CraziSilverAngel lolita and hime gyaru clothing and accesories^-^! This will be my blog for my website and how the designs go and sneak previews and what not ^0^!
 
A little about me:
Name: Victoria 
Favorite brandz: Angelic Pretty, Victorian Maiden, Cecil Mcbee, Jesus DIamante, Chanel, Christian Dior
Age: 18 
Favorite color: not sure 
Current favorite food: beef sashimi from Guu 
Goals: I hope the website goes well ^-^ enough to pay for a store
